objects.text:
Active Noise Cancellation
60H Playtime
Deep Bass Audio
Comfortable Design

product_details.name: TUINYO Wireless Headphones - Noise Cancelling Over Ear Bluetooth Headphones with 60H Playtime, Deep Bass Hi-Fi Stereo Sound & Comfortable Earpads for Travel, Home and Office-Green…
product_details.description: Noise Control: Active Noise Cancellation. Headphones Jack: 3.5 mm Jack. Model Name: WH-960. Connectivity Technology: Wireless, Wired. Wireless Communication Technology: Bluetooth. Age Range (Description): Adult. Material: Plastic. Specific Uses For Product: Music, Travel, Gaming. Charging Time: 2 Hours. Compatible Devices: Television. Control Type: Media Control. Cable Feature: Without Cable. Item Weight: 11.2 ounces. Customer Package Type: FFP. Style: Modern. Number of Items: 1. Battery Life: 60 Hours. Bluetooth Range: 10 Meters. Bluetooth Version: 5.3. Earpiece Shape: Round. Product Dimensions: 5 x 3 x 7 inches. Batteries: 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required. (included). Country of Origin: China.

banner_details:
The banner presents a premium wireless headphones promotion with a modern and tech-savvy aesthetic, using bold geometric layering and gradients. The design is divided diagonally between two-tone backgrounds — a deep green gradient on the upper left and a light pastel green gradient on the lower right. Positioned prominently on the right is a detailed product image of the headphones ("product_image"). At the top left is the main brand name in a futuristic typeface ("heading"), followed by a bold subheading indicating the product type ("subheading"). Below that rests a clean, bullet-style feature list ("description"). The price ("price") is displayed in large, attention-grabbing typography. Beneath it is a green rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_button") labeled with a high-contrast encouraging message ("cta").

Color Palette:
- Deep Forest Green (#2D4D38)
- Sage Green (#4A6F5D)
- Misty Green (#C4D7C8)
- Soft Ivory (#E5F0E7)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Accent Green (#8BC2A1)
- Dark Moss (#1A2F05)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern pair of headphones in a muted pastel green hue, ideal for a minimalist advertisement banner. The primary color is a soft sage green (#C3D1BA), complemented by metallic accents in a light olive green tone (#B2C4A2). These tones are harmoniously blended using a matte and satiny finish, creating a refined aesthetic. Highlights on the metallic sections subtly catch light, giving the product a polished yet understated look. A neutral gray (#8B8F87) used in the inner ear padding adds depth without overpowering the primary green tones. This sophisticated palette evokes calmness, elegance, and modernity.
